response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a significant premium over its intrinsic value of $800,000, which I believe reflects its unique qualities and potential benefits to you. I am confident that you will find the investment worthwhile and appreciate the opportunity to own such a valuable asset. Please let me know if you require any additional information or if you wish to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
